TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供若干使用和发布 SOAP 格式的远程对象的方法。

span.span: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects in SOAP format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类，使链接要求。This class makes a link demand. 如果直接调用方没有基础结构的权限，则会引发一个安全异常。A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的成员类之间进行转换对象和 XML 类型。The following code example shows how to use the members in the class to convert between a object and an XML type. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#100](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#100)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#100)]

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.

permission.span: 要求值： ;权限值：

span.span: Demand value: ; Permission Value:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前方法由.NET Framework 和 SoapSuds 工具用于创建公共语言运行时对象类型的 XML 命名空间名称。The current method is used by the .NET Framework and the SoapSuds tool to create an XML namespace name for a common language runtime object type. 有关 SoapSuds 的详细信息，请参阅[Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5)。For more information about SoapSuds, see [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#101](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#101)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#101)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 分析 XML 流时，它需要知道如何将转换到公共语言运行时类型从流中读取的 XML。When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types. 指定应生成.NET Framework 的方式的信息和 XML 流存储在位于的自定义特性中的分析命名空间。The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the namespace. 有两种方法能够在配置文件中指定此信息： 通过显式指定映射，或通过指定要预加载的对象类型。There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload. 当前方法支持检索这些映射。The current method supports the retrieval of such mappings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#102](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#102)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#102)]

summary.span: 从 XML 特性名、命名空间和包含对象的 中检索字段类型。

span.span: Retrieves field type from XML attribute name, namespace, and the of the containing object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定的包含对象的 XML 属性和.NET Framework 中读取的 XML 命名空间的类型，当前方法返回的实际公共语言运行时字段名称和类型的字段。Given the type of the containing object and the XML attribute and XML namespace that is read in by the .NET Framework, the current method returns the actual common language runtime field name and type of the field. .NET Framework 然后使用此信息从 XML 流中读取的数据填充该字段。The .NET Framework then uses this information to populate that field with the data read in from the XML stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#150](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#150)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 分析 XML 流时，它需要知道如何将转换到公共语言运行时类型从流中读取的 XML。When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types. 指定应生成.NET Framework 的方式的信息和 XML 流存储在位于的自定义特性中的分析命名空间。The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the namespace. 有两种方法能够在配置文件中指定此信息： 通过显式指定映射，或通过指定要预加载的对象类型。There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload. 在预加载过程中读取的自定义特性，并且在它们中的信息可用于 SOAP 分析器。The custom attributes are read during the preloading process and the information in them is made available to the SOAP parser. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#120)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 分析 XML 流时，它需要知道如何将转换到公共语言运行时类型从流中读取的 XML。When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types. 指定应生成.NET Framework 的方式的信息和 XML 流存储在位于的自定义特性中的分析命名空间。The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the namespace. 有两种方法能够在配置文件中指定此信息： 通过显式指定映射，或通过指定要预加载的对象类型。There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload. 在预加载过程中读取的自定义特性，并且在它们中的信息可用于 SOAP 分析器。The custom attributes are read during the preloading process and the information in them is made available to the SOAP parser. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的指定方法的 SOAPAction属性，或从网络中读取。The SOAPAction of the specified method is contained in the property, or is read off the wire. 当前方法将关联与 SOAPAction在信道接收器中使用。The current method associates the SOAPAction with the for use in channel sinks. SOAPAction HTTP 请求标头字段指示 SOAP HTTP 请求的意图。The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request. 值是标识意图的 URI。The value is a URI identifying the intent. SOAP 格式或者特殊性 URI 上放置不受限制或它是可解析。SOAP places no restrictions on the format or specificity of the URI or that it is resolvable. 颁发 SOAP HTTP 请求时，HTTP 客户端必须使用此标头字段。An HTTP client must use this header field when issuing a SOAP HTTP request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. SOAP 格式或者特殊性 URI 上放置不受限制或它是可解析。SOAP places no restrictions on the format or specificity of the URI or that it is resolvable. 颁发 SOAP HTTP 请求时，HTTP 客户端必须使用此标头字段。An HTTP client must use this header field when issuing a SOAP HTTP request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 和 SOAP 协议编码为 XML 命名空间的公共语言运行时类。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 当前的属性指定的 XML 命名空间的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 有关公共语言运行时类的所有 XML 命名空间都开头当前属性返回。All XML namespaces for a common language runtime class start with the that the current property returns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于具有程序集但没有本机命名空间的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: The default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has an assembly, but no native namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 和 SOAP 协议编码为 XML 命名空间的公共语言运行时类。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 当前的属性指定的 XML 命名空间的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果公共语言运行时类具有程序集但不是在命名空间，当前的属性将返回使用的默认 XML 命名空间。If a common language runtime class has an assembly but no namespace, the current property returns the default XML namespace that is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#131](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#131)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#131](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#131)]

exception.span: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.

permission.span: 关联的枚举：

span.span: Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public static string XmlNsForClrTypeWithNs { get; }
.property string XmlNsForClrTypeWithNs
Public Shared ReadOnly Property XmlNsForClrTypeWithNs As String
public: static property System::String ^ XmlNsForClrTypeWithNs { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于作为 mscorlib.dll 文件组成部分的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: Gets the XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that is part of the mscorlib.dll file.

value.span: XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于作为 mscorlib.dll 文件组成部分的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: The XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that is part of the mscorlib.dll file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 和 SOAP 协议编码为 XML 命名空间的公共语言运行时类。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 当前的属性指定的 XML 命名空间的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果公共语言运行时类是 mscorlib 程序集的一部分，则使用当前的属性返回的 XML 命名空间。If a common language runtime class is part of the mscorlib assembly, the XML namespace returned by the current property is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#132](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#132)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#132](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#132)]

summary.span: 获取默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于既具有公共语言运行时命名空间也具有程序集的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: Gets the default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has both a common language runtime namespace and an assembly.

value.span: 默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于既具有公共语言运行时命名空间也具有程序集的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: The default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has both a common language runtime namespace and an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 和 SOAP 协议编码为 XML 命名空间的公共语言运行时类。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 当前的属性指定的 XML 命名空间的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果公共语言运行时类具有程序集和公共语言运行时命名空间，当前的属性将返回使用的默认 XML 命名空间。If a common language runtime class has an assembly and a common language runtime namespace, the current property returns the default XML namespace that is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
